tool.name: convert_bc_to_binary_RY.py
tool.description:
Convert fasta nucleotides to IUPAC nucleotide codes for binary barcodes.
A and G are converted to nucleotide code R. T, U and C are converted to Y. By default output is written to stdout.
Example usage: - write converted sequences from file in.fa to file file out.fa: convert_bc_to_binary_RY.py in.fa --outfile out.fa
tool.command:
convert_bc_to_binary_RY.py #if $positional_1 and $positional_1 is not None: $positional_1 #end if
$verbose $debug > $default
